title: Drink no Longer Water
creator_contributor_role: Australian Wine and Brandy Corporation, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Wine and wine making
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcoholic beverages
description: A humourous romp through various wine styles set in the country in a castle-like structure. Vignettes played out by actors - some in period costume to emulate the character of various wine varieties/styles from Moselle "for first lovers" through to claret are you old enough? Featuring Australian actors Steve Bisley and Mel Gibson in their youth.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003184; Let there be Wine!; Proposed; 2016
